segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see the sink overflowing unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her routine, missing the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pooling on the floor, seeping into everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy risks falling from that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's just a kid, reaching for simple joy in cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits patiently, but danger lurks nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden contrasts this indoor sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She'll be devastated when she realizes the damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies might not even be worth the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This unnoticed chaos feels so lonely and unfortunate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them gently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The domestic harmony is slipping away quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor family, on the edge of mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR
